channel.title: CVE Feed for AVEVA -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AVEVA -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-33873|2024-08-02T15:54:13.320Z -- aveva -- systemplatform
item.description: This privilege escalation vulnerability, if exploited, cloud allow a local OS-authenticated user with standard privileges to escalate to System privilege on the machine where these products are installed, resulting in complete compromise of the target machine.

item.title: CVE-2023-1256|2024-08-02T05:40:59.774Z -- aveva -- aveva%20plant%20scada
item.description: The listed versions of AVEVA Plant SCADA and AVEVA Telemetry Server are vulnerable to an improper authorization exploit which could allow an unauthenticated user to remotely read data, cause denial of service, and tamper with alarm states.

item.title: CVE-2023-34982|2024-08-02T16:17:04.179Z -- aveva -- systemplatform
item.description: This external control vulnerability, if exploited, could allow a local OS-authenticated user with standard privileges to delete files with System privilege on the machine where these products are installed, resulting in denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2023-31274|2024-08-02T14:53:30.876Z -- aveva -- pi%20server
item.description: AVEVA PI Server versions 2023 and 2018 SP3 P05 and prior contain a vulnerability that could allow an unauthenticated user to cause the PI Message Subsystem of a PI Server to consume available memory resulting in throttled processing of new PI Data Archive events and a partial denial-of-service condition.

item.title: CVE-2023-34348|2024-08-02T16:10:06.138Z -- aveva -- pi%20server
item.description: AVEVA PI Server versions 2023 and 2018 SP3 P05 and prior contain a vulnerability that could allow an unauthenticated user to remotely crash the PI Message Subsystem of a PI Server, resulting in a denial-of-service condition.

item.title: CVE-2023-6132|2024-08-02T08:21:17.249Z -- aveva -- aveva%20edge
item.description: The vulnerability, if exploited, could allow a malicious entity with access to the file system to achieve arbitrary code execution and privilege escalation by tricking AVEVA Edge to load an unsafe DLL.

item.title: CVE-2024-3468|2024-08-01T20:12:07.636Z -- aveva -- pi%20web%20api
item.description: There is a vulnerability in AVEVA PI Web API that could allow malicious code to execute on the PI Web API environment under the privileges of an interactive user that was socially engineered to use API XML import functionality with content supplied by an attacker.

item.title: CVE-2024-3467|2024-08-01T20:12:07.612Z -- aveva -- pi%20asset%20framework%20client
item.description: There is a vulnerability in AVEVA PI Asset Framework Client that could allow malicious code to execute on the PI System Explorer environment under the privileges of an interactive user that was socially engineered to import XML supplied by an attacker.

item.title: CVE-2024-3468|2024-06-13T19:42:12.412Z -- aveva -- pi%20web%20api
item.description: There is a vulnerability in AVEVA PI Web API that could allow malicious code to execute on the PI Web API environment under the privileges of an interactive user that was socially engineered to use API XML import functionality with content supplied by an attacker.

item.title: CVE-2023-6132|2024-02-29T17:40:05.162Z -- aveva -- aveva%20edge
item.description: The vulnerability, if exploited, could allow a malicious entity with access to the file system to achieve arbitrary code execution and privilege escalation by tricking AVEVA Edge to load an unsafe DLL.

item.title: CVE-2024-3467|2024-06-12T21:04:26.635Z -- aveva -- pi%20asset%20framework%20client
item.description: There is a vulnerability in AVEVA PI Asset Framework Client that could allow malicious code to execute on the PI System Explorer environment under the privileges of an interactive user that was socially engineered to import XML supplied by an attacker.

item.title: CVE-2024-3468|2024-06-12T21:04:28.259Z -- aveva -- pi%20web%20api
item.description: There is a vulnerability in AVEVA PI Web API that could allow malicious code to execute on the PI Web API environment under the privileges of an interactive user that was socially engineered to use API XML import functionality with content supplied by an attacker.

item.title: CVE-2024-3467|2024-07-03T18:32:56.636Z -- aveva -- pi%20asset%20framework%20client
item.description: There is a vulnerability in AVEVA PI Asset Framework Client that could allow malicious code to execute on the PI System Explorer environment under the privileges of an interactive user that was socially engineered to import XML supplied by an attacker.
